message: I'm looking at dajaxproject.com and wondering whether other people use it or not.  The Dajaxice JS-agnostic approach seems pretty good, but I'm looking at the Dajax part and it totally mixes presentation into the view.  That seems quite odd to me.
at first glance, I don't see what is easier about this than simply using django annoying's @ajax_requst decorator or JsonResponse
I did not know django-annoying, thanks
